description:
Deciding to ride bagless, doesn’t need to mean tool-less. If you’re the type of rider that has zap-straps stuffed in your bottom bracket and a master link taped to your frame, your going to love the EDC V2 tool. OneUp has created a tool that is incredibly hard to forget, because it’s in your bike, or your pump. Compatible with OneUp’s Threadless Carrier and EDC pumps (both sold separately), the EDC V2 tool makes use of unused real estate, so it’s there when you need it and gone when you don’t.

  • 10 function multitool has all of your M-check needs covered, with: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8mm allen wrenches, T25 Torx™ and a flat head screwdriver
  • Tire lever has an integrated chain breaker, spoke wrenches (0, 1, 2, 3), and valve core tool
  • Tubeless tire plugs (x4) and an insertion tool
  • Chain pliers for undoing master links
  • Spare rotor bolt, so you won’t need to steal one from your shoe
  • Small and large sealed storage canisters let you further customize your tool, pack along some cash, Band-Aids, or ibuprofen
  • Holds a single 20g CO2 canister (in place of small or large sealed storage canisters)
  • Requires OneUp’s Threadless Carrier for in-bike storage (not included)
  • Fits inside OneUp’s 70CC and 100CC EDC Pumps (sold separately)
name: OneUp EDC V2 Tool
